args.natural_language_statement: Let A ∈ O(n) with columns A1,...,An. Deduce that {A1,...,An} is an orthonormal basis of ℝ^n.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Real Set Filter RCLike Submodule Function Uniformity Topology NNReal ENNReal
open Submodule
open FiniteDimensional

/-- Let A ∈ O(n) with columns A1,...,An. Deduce that {A1,...,An} is an orthonormal basis of ℝ^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_mem_orthogonal_extracted [RCLike 𝕜] [NormedAddCommGroup E]
 [InnerProductSpace 𝕜 E] {A : Matrix n n 𝕜} :
 A ∈ Matrix.orthogonalGroup n 𝕜 → Orthonormal 𝕜 fun i => A.transpose i := sorry"}

import Mathlib

/-- Let A ∈ O(n) with columns A1,...,An. Deduce that {A1,...,An} is an orthonormal basis of ℝ^n. -/
theorem orthonormal_cols_of_orthogonal_matrix {n : ℕ} {A : Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ}
  (hA : A ∈ OrthogonalGroup (Fin n)) :
  Orthonormal ℝ fun i : Fin n => A.col i := by
  sorry

args.natural_language_statement: Let A ∈ O(n) with columns A1,...,An. Deduce that {A1,...,An} is an orthonormal basis of ℝ^n.

result:
{"ok": true, "lean_translation": "import Mathlib
open Real Set Filter RCLike Submodule Function Uniformity Topology NNReal ENNReal
open Submodule
open FiniteDimensional

/-- Let A ∈ O(n) with columns A1,...,An. Deduce that {A1,...,An} is an orthonormal basis of ℝ^n. -/
theorem OrthonormalBasis_of_orthogonal_matrix (A : Matrix n n ℝ) (h : A.det = 1) :
    OrthonormalBasis (Fin n) ℝ (⟨_, h⟩ : Submodule ℝ (n → ℝ)) := sorry"}
